section.title: Indirect questions
section.sectiontitle: Use indirect questions to sound more polite. Start the questions with Can you tell me or Do you know. Use the same word order as positive statements.
section.text1a: Can you tell me where she lives?
section.text2a: Do you know when the film starts?
section.text3a: Do you know if Mr Smith is there?
section.text4a: Can you tell me whether Mary lives here?
